index.description: A comma-separated list of index names

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)

allow_no_indices.description: Ignore if a wildcard expression resolves to no concrete indices (default: false)

expand_wildcards.description: Whether wildcard expressions should get expanded to open or closed indices (default: open)

flat_settings.description: Return settings in flat format (default: false)

human.description: Whether to return version and creation date values in human-readable format.
